attributes.action: That the British Government DOES NOT support Tony Blair to become President of Europe when the constitution comes into effect.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Since 1997 Tony Blair has had one project in mind, to become President of Europe. Since the government has not allowed the people of this nation a vote on the Constitution exactly why should Europe and this nation be expected to have forced upon us a man who, from reading many website news posts, is not wanted by a majority of people in the UK as well as a greater part of Europe.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
